images.description: Journal des Luxus und der Moden

images.title: half armor
images.description: Half armor, Augsburg, c. 1570, Part of a formerly large set attributed to Duke Johann Wilhelm of Saxe-Weimar, made by Anton Pfeffenhauser (1525 - 1603), art collections of the Veste Coburg, Inv.No. I.005

images.title: Saxon Elector Christian I
images.description: Portrait of Christian I, Elector of Saxony (1560-1591), Zacharias Wehme (1558-1606), c. 1590, oil on canvas, 252 x 138 cm, Dresden State Art Collections, Inv.-No. 99/112

images.title: Field and Tournament Armor of Johann Wilhelm
images.description: Field and Tournament Armor of Johann Wilhelm (1530–1573), Duke of Saxe-Weimar, attributed to Anton Peffenhauser, etched decoration attributed to Jörg Sorg the Younger German, ca. 1565, MET, Accession Number: 29.155.2

images.title: Doublet
images.description: The arm position in this arrangement is more natural and shows the widths of the sleeves.
